title: Edum ariyEnE
sahitya:
Edum ariyEnE maraimIdurai periyOnE nin pugazh Oda arivEnO nAn shiriyEnE

anupallavi
 
sAdhu jana samrakSaka guhanE kuramAdu vaLLi kunjari manOhara SaNmukhanE

caraNam
 
shrI nArada gAna lOla vara shrI harihara rUpa krpAlavAla nakkIra kavi
aruNagirikkaruL vai vEla ingengum aruLAyEl en sheivEn kunjaradAsanEn shAla
